cast.overview: A young Jewish American man endeavors—with the help of eccentric, distant relatives—to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II—in a Ukrainian village which was ultimately razed by the Nazis.
cast.title: Everything Is Illuminated

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Eugene Hütz (September 6, 1972) is a Ukrainian-born singer and composer, most notable as the frontman of the critically acclaimed New York Gypsy punk band Gogol Bordello. Hütz is also a DJ and actor.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Eugene Hütz, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Eugene Hutz
details.place_of_birth: Boyarka, Kiev Oblast, Ukrainian SSR, USSR [now Ukraine]
